brief_summary: To assess the effect on weight loss and weight maintenance over a period of one year when prescribed with a hypocaloric diet in obese patients with Type 2 Diabetes
criteria: - BMI must be greater than 27 and less than 40 - Treated Type 2 Diabetes on single therapy treatment for at least 1 year - Stable weight (variation of less than 5 kg within 3 months prior to screening visit)
